also, another stupid question, how you stealth Games?

The easiest way would be to update the firmware to the IXtreme LT+ 1.1 Lite Touch version.
It currently needs the iso disk to play because your firmware is trying to protect you from alerting MS; you have a data signature on the video partition of the game disk it does not recognise which often acts as a flag to microsoft - corrupted due to copying. However, MS have used this partition to include an update to the dashboard software, which the firmware could not predict at the time it was made: it sees update and corruption as the same thing. I think the new firmware lets any game play and reports the official sigs to MS if the partition has been corrupted or not - though I'm not 100% certain on that last point. I am sure however, that a firmware update will remedy the situation safely without requiring the boot disk.
CONFIRMED - works great...THANKS :D

Why doesn't this game work? I dled, unrared the .iso and .dvd file, wrote at 2x speed (took ages), and tried to play and I got a coaster. This has been happening a lot lately. I know nothing is wrong with the technique; I've used this technique before to get perfectly working games; so what is the problem? Is it that my drive has stopped working? ppl say the torrents work, so it's not that. I can't keep wasting dvds; rw+ dvds ain't cheap. Any solutions?
ctd... Could it be that I burned at 2x speed instead of 2.4x? I just looked it up in a guide, and that seems to be the only thing I'm doing differently.
2 or 2.4 should both be ok, maybe your flashed FW is out of date, try getting LT+ installed (reflashed) to your drive
http://xboxlivegenerator.com/?i=146961

@black_shadow_1981 OK... does reflashing something you have to open your xbox to do? I actually bought this xbox second hand already flashed, so I'm not familiar with the procedure. I wasn't even aware that flashing could get out of date.

yeah flashing drives does become out of date in time as newer games come out, i didnt flash my drive but yes you would have to open your box, it was easyer for me too pay someone $40 to do it for me (my box was flashed just before xmas 2010) as far as i know LT+ is the newst FW for the older fat shape xbox 360s, im sorry i cant be more help mate but i would recomend getting your box reflashed if its more then a year old i watched the guy flash mine and he opend the box and did something with his pc and the dvd drive from the xbox to get it working
